section.title: Modelling parts and wholes
section.para: We have three entries with one sense each: "glasses", "microscope" and "lens". We want to represent the fact that "lens" is a meronym of both "glasses" and "microscope", and simultanously that "glasses" and "microscope" are both holonyms of "lens".
